description: Earliest monotonic sequence fixed (apart from signs) under reversion.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: M. Bernstein and N. J. A. Sloane, Some canonical sequences of integers, Linear Alg. Applications, 226-228 (1995), 57-72; erratum 320 (2000), 210.
Index entries for reversions of series
formula: Series reversion of g.f. A(x) is -A(-x). - _Michael Somos_, Sep 07 2005
maple: read transforms; t1 := [1,2,4,7,10,12,18]; REVERT(t1); # gives [1, -2, 4, -7, 10, -12, 18] and so on
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
